attributes.action: AWARENESS OF NEONATAL DEATHS WITH PRINTED LEAFLETS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need more neonatal death awareness.
We need more information on all the neonatal deaths and access to a website showing how many premature babies died in the uk hospitals. We need more leaflets on neonatals wards explaining all neonatal deaths.....need more written advice....
